hero.desc: Join our community and book a meeting with one of our specialists and discuss your issue.

section_1.desc: Book a meeting with your doctor and make an online video chat.

section_2.desc: If you are a doctor, you will benefit from the experiences gained from patients in addition to benefiting materially.

section_3.desc: Follow doctors accounts where they do share their experiences and thoughts in their field.

doctor_support.desc:
You can find doctors from different nationalities and specialties in our community!
During your walkthrough, you can search and book meetings with doctors with ease.
All doctors here are available and always ready to help.

top_doctors.desc: Get to know our top rated doctors according to patient evaluations.

doctors.desc: Discover a list of experienced doctors in many specialities and book meetings easily.

left_section.brand_statement: Ease of use - Experienced doctors - Trusted advice

sign_in.sign_up_link: Don't have an existing account? <Link to='/sign-up'>Sign up</Link>

sign_up.desc: Become a member in our community
sign_up.sign_in_link: Already have an account? <Link to='/sign-in'>Log in</Link>
sign_up.doctor_sign_up_link: Are you a doctor? <Link to='/doctor/sign-up'>Sign-up here</Link>

links.normal_user_sign_up: Sign up as a normal user
